div.p: This Implementation Guide includes the test plan for how MHV uses and responds to PGHD

p.p: This includes the test plan, profiles of how MHV publishes, examples that match that profile, and examples that are good FHIR Resources that MHV should handle well

div.p: The main sections of this IG are:

ul.li: Background - This is the overall Test Plan
Artifacts - This includes all computable artifacts used
Downloads - Allows downloading a copy of this implementation guide and other useful information
